name.ja: <ruby>識<rt>しき</rt></ruby><ruby>無<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>辺<rt>へん</rt></ruby><ruby>世<rt>せ</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby>

text.en: If "Vicious Astroud" is on the field: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then, if the destroyed card's original name was "Vicious Astroud", you can Special Summon 1 of your banished "Visas Starfrost". Otherwise, you can make 1 "Vicious Astroud" you control gain 1500 ATK.
